IntVectorProperty.name: Enabled
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Enable/Disable widget interaction.

IntVectorProperty.name: Enabled
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Enable/Disable widget interaction.

IntVectorProperty.name: Enabled
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Enable/Disable widget interaction.

IntVectorProperty.name: Enabled
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Enable/Disable widget interaction.

IntVectorProperty.name: Enabled
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Enable/Disable widget interaction.

NewWidgetRepresentationProxy.name: BoxWidgetRepresentation
NewWidgetRepresentationProxy.Documentation: Representation proxy for the box widget. This includes the widget/representation proxies for the box 3D widget.

IntVectorProperty.name: Enabled
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Enable/Disable widget interaction.

NewWidgetRepresentationProxy.name: SphereWidgetRepresentation
NewWidgetRepresentationProxy.Documentation: Representation proxy for the sphere widget. This includes the widget/representation proxies for the sphere 3D widget.

IntVectorProperty.name: Enabled
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Enable/Disable widget interaction.

NewWidgetRepresentationProxy.name: ImplicitCylinderWidgetRepresentation
NewWidgetRepresentationProxy.Documentation: Representation proxy for the sphere widget. This includes the widget/representation proxies for the sphere 3D widget.

IntVectorProperty.name: Enabled
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Enable/Disable widget interaction.

IntVectorProperty.name: Enabled
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Enable/Disable widget interaction.

NewWidgetRepresentationProxy.name: PolyLineWidgetRepresentation
NewWidgetRepresentationProxy.Documentation: Representation proxy for the poly line widget. This includes the widget/representation proxies for the sphere 3D widget.

IntVectorProperty.name: Enabled
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Enable/Disable widget interaction.

NewWidgetRepresentationProxy.name: SplineWidgetRepresentation
NewWidgetRepresentationProxy.Documentation: Representation proxy for the spline widget. This includes the widget/representation proxies for the sphere 3D widget.

IntVectorProperty.name: Enabled
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Enable/Disable widget interaction.

NewWidgetRepresentationProxy.name: ContourWidgetRepresentation
NewWidgetRepresentationProxy.Documentation: Representation proxy for the Contour widget. This includes the widget/representation proxies for the sphere 3D widget.

IntVectorProperty.name: Enabled
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Enable/Disable widget interaction.

ScalarBarWidgetRepresentationProxy.name: ScalarBarWidgetRepresentation
ScalarBarWidgetRepresentationProxy.Documentation: ScalarBarWidgetRepresentation is a representation for a scalar bar including a widget to control the position and orientation of the scalar bar.

IntVectorProperty.name: Enabled
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Enable/Disable widget interaction.

IntVectorProperty.name: LockPosition
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set this to 1 if you don't want the application to change the scalar bar position when placing automatically.

IntVectorProperty.name: StickyVisible
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: If the user manually toggles the scalar bar visibility, we keep that information in the scalar bar representation, and will never / always show it until the scalar bar button is toggled again on this array.

TextWidgetRepresentationProxy.name: TextWidgetRepresentation
TextWidgetRepresentationProxy.Documentation: TextWidgetRepresentation is a representation for text widget as well as the representation for the text shown in the widget.

IntVectorProperty.name: Enabled
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Enable/Disable widget interaction.

NewWidgetRepresentationProxy.name: ProgressBarWidgetRepresentation
NewWidgetRepresentationProxy.Documentation: ProgressBarWidgetRepresentation is a representation for progress bar widget as well as the representation for the progress bar shown in the widget.

IntVectorProperty.name: Enabled
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Enable/Disable widget interaction.

NewWidgetRepresentationProxy.name: LogoWidgetRepresentation
NewWidgetRepresentationProxy.Documentation: LogoWidgetRepresentation is a representation for a logo widget

IntVectorProperty.name: Enabled
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Enable/Disable widget interaction.

Proxy.name: OrientedGlyphContourRepresentation
Proxy.Documentation: Proxy for vtkOrientedGlyphContourRepresentation. Don't use directly since it's not coupled with the widget. Use "ContourWidgetRepresentation" instead which include this representation as well as the widget to modify the representation.

Proxy.name: SplineRepresentation
Proxy.Documentation: Proxy for vtkSplineRepresentation. Don't use directly since it's not coupled with the widget. Use "SplineWidgetRepresentation" instead which include this representation as well as the widget to modify the representation.

Proxy.name: SphereRepresentation
Proxy.Documentation: Proxy for vtkSphereRepresentation. Don't confuse this with the vtkSMRepresentation proxy for the sphere widget (which is the SphereWidgetRepresentation).

IntVectorProperty.name: Representation
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the representation (i.e., appearance) of the sphere. Different representations are useful depending on the application.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: Center
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: The center position of the sphere. Note that this may adjust the direction from the handle to the center, as well as the radius of the sphere.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: Radius
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: The radius of sphere. Default is 0.5. Note that this may modify the position of the handle based on the handle direction.

IntVectorProperty.name: HandleVisibility
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: The handle sits on the surface of the sphere and may be moved around the surface by picking (left mouse) and then moving. The position of the handle can be retrieved, this is useful for positioning cameras and lights. By default, the handle is turned off.

IntVectorProperty.name: HandleText
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Enable/disable a label that displays the location of the handle in spherical coordinates (radius,theta,phi). The two angles, theta and phi, are displayed in degrees. Note that phi is measured from the north pole down towards the equator; and theta is the angle around the north/south axis.

IntVectorProperty.name: RadialLine
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Enable/disable a radial line segment that joins the center of the outer sphere and the handle.

IntVectorProperty.name: CenterCursor
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Enable/disable a cursor that is shown at the center of the sphere.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: HandleDirection
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Set/Get the direction vector of the handle relative to the center of the sphere. This may affect the position of the handle and the radius of the sphere.

BoxRepresentationProxy.name: BoxRepresentation
BoxRepresentationProxy.Documentation: Proxy for vtkBoxRepresentation. Don't confuse this with the vtkSMRepresentation proxy for the box widget (which is the BoxWidgetRepresentation).

Proxy.name: ImplicitCylinderRepresentation
Proxy.Documentation: Proxy for vtkImplicitCylinderWidget. Don't confuse this with the vtkSMRepresentation proxy for the cylinder widget (which is the ImplicitCylinderWidget).

DoubleVectorProperty.name: Center
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: The center of the cylinder. The center is located along the cylinder axis.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: Axis
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: The axis of rotation for the cylinder. If the axis is not specified as a unit vector, it will be normalized.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: Radius
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: The radius of the cylinder. Note that if the radius is too big the cylinder will be outside of the bounding box.

IntVectorProperty.name: DrawCylinder
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Enable/disable the drawing of the cylinder. In some cases the cylinder interferes with the object that it is operating on (e.g., the cylinder interferes with the cut surface it produces resulting in z-buffer artifacts.) By default it is on.

IntVectorProperty.name: Resolution
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: This is the number of polygonal facets used to approximate the curved cylindrical surface (for rendering purposes). An vtkCylinder is used under the hood to provide an exact surface representation.

IntVectorProperty.name: Tubing
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Enable/disable tubing of the wire outline of the cylinder intersection (against the bounding box). The tube thickens the line by wrapping with a vtkTubeFilter..

IntVectorProperty.name: OutlineTranslation
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Enable/disable the ability to translate the bounding box by moving it with the mouse.

IntVectorProperty.name: OutsideBounds
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Enable/disable the ability to move the widget outside of the bounds specified in the initial PlaceWidget() invocation.

IntVectorProperty.name: ScaleEnabled
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Enable/disable the ability to scale the widget with the mouse.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: Position
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Specify the anchor position (bottom-left corner of the scalar bar) in normalized viewport coordinates in range [0, 1]. This is used only when **Window Location** is set to **AnyLocation**.

IntVectorProperty.name: AutoOrient
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set if color legend's orientation will be updated based on its position.

IntVectorProperty.name: Orientation
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Specify orientation of the color legend. Can be used only if Auto Orient is disabled.

IntVectorProperty.name: WindowLocation
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Specify placement of the color legend.

IntVectorProperty.name: ShowBorder
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set whether the border is always drawn, only on interaction or never.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: BorderColor
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the color of the border.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: BorderThickness
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the thickness of the border.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: CornerRadius
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the radius of the round corners in percent of the maximum allowed.

IntVectorProperty.name: CornerResolution
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the number of points that define each round corner.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: BackgroundColor
DoubleVectorProperty.label: Background Color
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the color and opacity of the border background.

IntVectorProperty.name: Padding
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the padding around the text in pixels unit.

Proxy.name: WidgetBase
Proxy.Documentation: Base API definition for all 3D widgets.

IntVectorProperty.name: TranslationEnabled
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set whether to allow this 3D widget to be interactively translated.

IntVectorProperty.name: ScalingEnabled
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set whether to allow this 3D widget to be interactively sclaed.

IntVectorProperty.name: RotationEnabled
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set whether to allow this 3D widget to be interactively rotated.

IntVectorProperty.name: MoveFacesEnabled
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set whether to allow interactive face movement to be performed on this 3D widget.
